other_tests.findings: Predexamethasone cortisol values were abnormally high with a lack of diurnal variation; postdexamethasone cortisol levels remained elevated after the first ECT.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Pre-dexamethasone cortisol levels normalized after 7 ECTs, with normal diurnal variation. After 9 ECTs, all post-dexamethasone cortisol levels were normally suppressed, indicating progressive improvement.
